title: LocalStorage via innerHTML
description: Demonstrates DOM-based XSS where untrusted data is retrieved from LocalStorage and directly inserted into the DOM using innerHTML.
objectives: Understand how LocalStorage can be used to persist payloads across sessions.
Identify unsafe usage of innerHTML with data from localStorage.
Exploit the vulnerability to execute arbitrary JavaScript.
hints: Open DevTools and set localStorage['note'] = ''
Refresh the page and observe the execution.
